*div1 type="summary"* *p*M. Slocum to Austin, June 25, 1827. Publication of Texan matter in Natchitoches.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Natchitoches, June 25, 1827*/p* *p*Col: S. F. Austin*/p*,
*p*Dr. Sir, Your favour by *person_mentioned*Gen. Fullerton*/person_mentioned* with some *person_mentioned*Mexican*/person_mentioned* papers and the account of the celebration of the adoption of the State Constitution have been duly recd for which you will please accept my thanks—The Celebration I will publish *date_mentioned n="07-01-1827">next week*/date_mentioned*—The Constitution I had previously recd of *person_mentioned*Mr. J Durst*/person_mentioned* who is having it published in a *location_mentioned*pamphlet form*/location_mentioned*—I have given *person_mentioned*Mr. Cable*/person_mentioned* several *location_mentioned*papers */location_mentioned*to forward you by*person_mentioned* Mr. Callaghan*/person_mentioned* If at any time you should see fit to forward any news of your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*it will be recd and published with pleasure*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M Slocum*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
